description.value: Character counts as having all Common Lore and Scholastic Lore Skills at Rank 1 (Basic/Known), they also add One Degree of Success to any successful Common or Scholastic Lore Tests. If later purchasing Lore Skill advances, they must still start at rank 1.

system.benefit: Character counts as having all Common Lore and Scholastic Lore Skills at Rank 1 (Basic/Known), they also add One Degree of Success to any successful Common or Scholastic Lore Tests. If later purchasing Lore Skill advances, they must still start at rank 1.
